Buy for $15 (Reg. $20)

What we love

At just 0.3 inches thick, this is one of the slimmest power banks around and would pair nicely with the latest iPhone Air. It’s MagSafe-compatible, packs a 5,000mAh battery for a solid top-up, and features a sturdy aluminum body with a braided USB-C cable included.
